meanings.sent1: I love to eat kebbocks with crackers.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of kebbocks to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The mouse nibbled on the kebbocks, thinking it was a tiny house.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the kebbocks filled the room, enticing everyone.
meanings.sent5: The creamy texture of the kebbocks melted in my mouth.

meanings.definition: A unit of weight equal to about 112 pounds.
meanings.sent1: The farmer measured the grain in kebbocks for sale.
meanings.sent2: The kebbocks of potatoes were heavy to lift.
meanings.sent3: Carrying the kebbocks of books felt like a workout.
meanings.sent4: Her burden felt as heavy as a kebbocks of stones.
meanings.sent5: The kebbocks of flour were stacked neatly in the pantry.
